original_title: NEWSLINE: Hejaaz Hizbullah on Anti-Terrorism Bill
original_body_lines: Colombo (News 1st) – Attorney Hejaaz Hizbullah compares the Prevention of Terrorism Act (PTA) against the Anti-Terrorism Bill on Newsline with Faraz Shauketaly.
Anti-Terrorism Act, that is to replace the PTA, is an even more serious threat to democracy
